content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column]

Discover Our Programs

If you are seeking to start, grow or build a career in tech, we have you covered. At Univelcity, we focus on industry-ready skills, prepare our students for the future of work while preparing them for top jobs in Nigeria and around the world.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”25″ css=”.vc_custom_1622030740991{margin-top: 25px !important;padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Funivelcity.com%2Fproject%2Fbackend-with-python-django%2F|title:Backend%20With%20Python%20Django|target:%20_blank|” el_class=”res-heading”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

F.A.Q

We’ve put together a list of frequently asked questions. If you have any additional questions, please contact us today!

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1622033259609{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_toggle title=”Is the program on-site or online?”]Our program is an on-site training program within our comfortable and conducive learning rooms.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”I do not have any technical background, can I join the course?”]You do not need any technical background or previous experience to join our programs. All we require s your willingness to learn and availability at the classes. Our facilitators will be sure to guide you through.

Be ready to go from Zero to Hero!!![/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”What is the program duration?”]The program runs for the duration of 3Months.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”What’s is the class schedule ?”]Weekend classes are held on Saturdays 10AM – 4PM.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”What are the prerequisite to access the program?”]Be motivated, curious, and willing to learn.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”What is the difference between Weekday and Weekend classes?”]The weekday program requires dedication as it holds twice a week and might not be compactible with other work or studies. Weekday classes are held twice a week from 10AM – 4PM. We would recommend this program if you are looking to dedicate a lot of your time and looking to make a quick transition.

The Weekend program is designed to suit individuals who work during the week or not available on weekdays. The weekend classes are held every Saturday of the week 10AM – 4PM. We recommend this program if you are unavailable during the weekdays but would love to still learn an IT skill.[/vc_toggle][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
